languages.text: Ахиллеас сообщил о налете на мир династии Винтерскейлов. Рейд предположительно возглавляет один из лидеров ксеносов, изводящих владения фон Валанциус. Это потенциальная возможность нанести удар врагу и узнать больше о природе соперника.

Achilleas has reported an attack on a world belonging to the Winterscale dynasty. Heading the raid is apparently one of the xenos leaders who has been harrying von Valancius holdings. This is an opportunity to strike a blow against an enemy and learn more about a rival.
languages.original_text: Ахиллеас сообщил о налете на мир династии Винтерскейлов. Рейд предположительно возглавляет один из лидеров ксеносов, изводящих владения фон Валанциус. Это потенциальная возможность нанести удар врагу и узнать больше о природе соперника.

Achilleas has reported an attack on a world belonging to the Winterscale dynasty. Heading the raid is apparently one of the xenos leaders who has been harrying von Valancius holdings. This is an opportunity to strike a blow against an enemy and learn more about a rival.

Achilleas has reported an attack on a world belonging to the Winterscale dynasty. Heading the raid is apparently one of the xenos leaders who has been harrying von Valancius holdings. This is an opportunity to strike a blow against an enemy and learn more about a rival.

languages.text: 阿吉里亚斯报告说，敌人袭击了温特斯凯尔王朝的某个世界。很显然，领导这场袭击的异形，就是一直在骚扰冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的异形领袖之一。抓住这个好机会打击敌人，了解竞争对手。
languages.original_text: Achilleas has reported an attack on a world belonging to the Winterscale dynasty. Heading the raid is apparently one of the xenos leaders who has been harrying von Valancius holdings. This is an opportunity to strike a blow against an enemy and learn more about a rival.

traits.locale_text: 阿吉里亚斯报告说，敌人袭击了温特斯凯尔王朝的某个世界。很显然，领导这场袭击的异形，就是一直在骚扰冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的异形领袖之一。抓住这个好机会打击敌人，了解竞争对手。

languages.text: ウィンタースケール王朝の惑星に襲撃があったという報告が、アキレアスによってなされた。この襲撃を指揮しているのは、フォン・ヴァランシウスの拠点を襲撃していた異種族のリーダーの一人のようだ。これは敵を攻撃し、ライバルを良く知るための良い機会だ。
languages.original_text: Achilleas has reported an attack on a world belonging to the Winterscale dynasty. Heading the raid is apparently one of the xenos leaders who has been harrying von Valancius holdings. This is an opportunity to strike a blow against an enemy and learn more about a rival.

traits.locale_text: ウィンタースケール王朝の惑星に襲撃があったという報告が、アキレアスによってなされた。この襲撃を指揮しているのは、フォン・ヴァランシウスの拠点を襲撃していた異種族のリーダーの一人のようだ。これは敵を攻撃し、ライバルを良く知るための良い機会だ。

languages.text: Achilleas ha informado de un ataque a un mundo de la dinastía Winterscale. Al parecer, la incursión está liderada por uno de los xenos que ha dirigido los asaltos a las propiedades de los von Valancius. Es una oportunidad de asestar un golpe al enemigo y de descubrir más sobre tu rival.
languages.original_text: Achilleas has reported an attack on a world belonging to the Winterscale dynasty. Heading the raid is apparently one of the xenos leaders who has been harrying von Valancius holdings. This is an opportunity to strike a blow against an enemy and learn more about a rival.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas ha informado de un ataque a un mundo de la dinastía Winterscale. Al parecer, la incursión está liderada por uno de los xenos que ha dirigido los asaltos a las propiedades de los von Valancius. Es una oportunidad de asestar un golpe al enemigo y de descubrir más sobre tu rival.

languages.text: Achilleas hat einen Angriff auf eine Welt der Winterzunder-Dynastie gemeldet. Hinter dem Angriff steckt offenbar ein Anführer der Xenos, die die Besitztümer derer zu Valancius plündert. Das ist eine Gelegenheit einem Gegner einen Schlag zuzufügen und mehr über einen Rivalen in Erfahrung zu bringen.
languages.original_text: Achilleas has reported an attack on a world belonging to the Winterscale dynasty. Heading the raid is apparently one of the xenos leaders who has been harrying von Valancius holdings. This is an opportunity to strike a blow against an enemy and learn more about a rival.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas hat einen Angriff auf eine Welt der Winterzunder-Dynastie gemeldet. Hinter dem Angriff steckt offenbar ein Anführer der Xenos, die die Besitztümer derer zu Valancius plündert. Das ist eine Gelegenheit einem Gegner einen Schlag zuzufügen und mehr über einen Rivalen in Erfahrung zu bringen.

languages.text: Achilleas a signalé une attaque sur un monde appartenant à la dynastie Winterscale. À l'origine de cette attaque se trouve apparemment l'un des chefs xénos ayant harcelé des propriétés des von Valancius. C'est l'occasion idéale de porter un coup à cet ennemi et d'en apprendre davantage sur un rival.
languages.original_text: Achilleas has reported an attack on a world belonging to the Winterscale dynasty. Heading the raid is apparently one of the xenos leaders who has been harrying von Valancius holdings. This is an opportunity to strike a blow against an enemy and learn more about a rival.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas a signalé une attaque sur un monde appartenant à la dynastie Winterscale. À l'origine de cette attaque se trouve apparemment l'un des chefs xénos ayant harcelé des propriétés des von Valancius. C'est l'occasion idéale de porter un coup à cet ennemi et d'en apprendre davantage sur un rival.

languages.text: Achilleas, Winterscale hanedanlığına ait bir dünyaya saldırı düzenlendiğini rapor etti. Anlaşılan o ki bu baskını, von Valancius topraklarını yağmalayan zeno liderlerinden biri yönetiyormuş. Düşmana büyük bir darbe vurup rakiplerden biri hakkında daha fazla şey öğrenmek için çok iyi bir fırsat.
languages.original_text: Achilleas has reported an attack on a world belonging to the Winterscale dynasty. Heading the raid is apparently one of the xenos leaders who has been harrying von Valancius holdings. This is an opportunity to strike a blow against an enemy and learn more about a rival.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas, Winterscale hanedanlığına ait bir dünyaya saldırı düzenlendiğini rapor etti. Anlaşılan o ki bu baskını, von Valancius'un varlıklarını yağmalayan zeno liderlerinden biri yönetiyormuş. Düşmana büyük bir darbe vurmak ve bu hasım hakkında daha fazla şey öğrenmek için çok iyi bir fırsat.
